xinstall.name: Language Selection Panel
xinstall.description: Displays available languages for the website.

param.name: css_name
param.label: CSS postfix
param.description: A value that will be added to all default class / id attributes for module identification.

param.name: show_type
param.label: Display type
param.description: Defines the way the language selector should be displayed.

param.name: show_all
param.label: Show current language
param.description: Defines whether the current language must be displayed in the language selector.

param.name: alpha_sort
param.label: Sort alphabetically
param.description: Defines whether the languages should be sorted or not.
